com.sorcix.sirc

Interface SIRCService


  • public interface SIRCService
    A service plugin running on sIRC. A service extends sIRC by adding much needed features such as auto rejoin, remembering channels and common bot features.
    Author:
    Sorcix
    See Also:
    IrcConnection.addService(SIRCService), IrcConnection.removeService(SIRCService), IrcConnection.removeAllServices()

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getName()
      Returns the name of this service.
      void load(IrcConnection irc)
      Called upon loading this service on sIRC.
      void unload(IrcConnection irc)
      Called upon removing this service from sIRC.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the name of this service. Used for listing active services.
        Returns:
        The name of this service.

      • load

        void load(IrcConnection irc)
        Called upon loading this service on sIRC.
        Parameters:
        irc - The IrcConnection running this service.

      • unload

        void unload(IrcConnection irc)
        Called upon removing this service from sIRC. Please make sure all listeners are removed from sIRC before returning this method.
        Parameters:
        irc - The IrcConnection running this service.
